trans-unit.source: A Windows Forms control that can be used to host a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) element.
trans-unit.target: Um controle do Windows Forms que pode ser usado para hospedar um elemento do WPF (Windows Presentation Foundation).

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> control to place a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> on your [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control or form.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> controle para colocar um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> em seu [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controle ou formulário.

trans-unit.source: To host a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> element.
trans-unit.target: Para hospedar um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controlar um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> elemento.

trans-unit.source: WindowsFormsIntegration.dll is installed with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] assemblies.
trans-unit.target: WindowsFormsIntegration é instalado com o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] assemblies.

trans-unit.source: The default location for the assembly is %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll.
trans-unit.target: O local padrão para o assembly é %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll.

trans-unit.source: To host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a Windows Form, you must assign the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para hospedar um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento em um formulário do Windows, você deve atribuir o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PropertyMap%2A> property to assign custom mappings between an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> control and its hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PropertyMap%2A> propriedade para atribuir mapeamentos personalizados entre um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> controle e seu hospedado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações, consulte [Windows Forms e mapeamento de propriedade do WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> control to host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> controle para hospedar um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting a 3-D WPF Composite Control in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [passo a passo: hospedando um controle composto do WPF 3D em Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" />.

trans-unit.source: for full trust for all callers higher in the call stack.
trans-unit.target: para confiança total para todos os chamadores superior na pilha de chamadas.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não pode ser usado pelo código parcialmente confiável.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is automatically resized to display its entire contents.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o controle é redimensionado automaticamente para exibir todo o seu conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control adjusts its size to closely fit its contents; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o controle ajustará seu tamanho em conjunto para seu conteúdo. Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted element has a transparent background.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor indicando se o elemento hospedado contém uma tela de fundo transparente.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the hosted element has a transparent background; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o elemento hospedado contém um plano de fundo transparente; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.BackColorTransparent%2A> property enables bitmap copying, which enables hosted elements to use transparency over the host container.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.BackColorTransparent%2A> propriedade permite a cópia de bitmap, o que permite hospedado elementos para usar transparência sobre o contêiner host.

trans-unit.source: This is useful when the element is over an image or gradient background.
trans-unit.target: Isso é útil quando o elemento está sobre uma imagem ou uma cor de fundo.

trans-unit.source: For performance reasons, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.BackColorTransparent%2A> property is turned off by default.
trans-unit.target: Por motivos de desempenho, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.BackColorTransparent%2A> propriedade está desativada por padrão.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.BindingContextChanged> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContextChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.BindingContextChanged>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContextChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode" /> property can be set to an active value to enable IME support.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode" /> pode ser definida para um valor ativo para habilitar o suporte ao IME.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" /> has a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child" /> element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" /> tem um <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child" /> elemento; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> hosted by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> hospedado pelo controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" />.

trans-unit.source: The hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: O elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] hospedado.

trans-unit.source: Only one element can be hosted, but <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child%2A> can have any number of child elements.
trans-unit.target: Somente um elemento pode ser hospedado, mas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child%2A> pode ter qualquer número de elementos filho.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child%2A> property to assign a hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child%2A> propriedade para atribuir um hospedado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting a 3-D WPF Composite Control in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [passo a passo: hospedando um controle composto do WPF 3D em Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child" /> property is set.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child" /> é definida.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um usuário clica no controle.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Click> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Click>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.ClientSizeChanged> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSizeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.ClientSizeChanged>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSizeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a new control is added to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um novo controle é adicionado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.ControlAdded> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAdded?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.ControlAdded>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAdded?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control is removed from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um controle é removido do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.ControlRemoved> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.ControlRemoved>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: For a more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.CursorChanged> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.CursorChanged> evento, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho padrão do controle.

trans-unit.source: The default <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> of the control.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> padrão do controle.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.DefaultSize%2A> property, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.DefaultSize%2A> propriedade, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Immediately frees any system resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Libera imediatamente quaisquer recursos do sistema usados pelo controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo método público `Dispose` e pelo método <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` invoca o método `Dispose(Boolean)` protegido com o parâmetro `disposing` definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, esse método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> referências.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o método `Dispose` de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> pode ser chamado várias vezes por outros objetos.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> cuidado para não fazer referência a objetos que têm foi descartados anteriormente em uma chamada anterior para <see langword="Dispose" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como implementar <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, consulte [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre <see langword="Dispose" /> e <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [substituindo o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um usuário clica duas vezes no controle.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.DoubleClick> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.DoubleClick>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a drag-and-drop operation is completed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma operação de arrastar e soltar é concluída.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.DragDrop> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.DragDrop>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an object is dragged into the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um objeto é arrastado para os limites do controle.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.DragEnter> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.DragEnter>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an object is dragged out of the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um objeto é arrastado para fora dos limites do controle.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.DragLeave> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.DragLeave>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an object is dragged over the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um objeto é arrastado sobre os limites do controle.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.DragOver> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.DragOver>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] window to be opened modelessly.
trans-unit.target: A janela [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] a ser aberta de modo sem janela restrita.

trans-unit.source: Enables a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> to receive keyboard messages correctly when it is opened modelessly from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Habilita um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> a receber as mensagens do teclado corretamente quando ele é aberto de modo sem janela restrita de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.EnableModelessKeyboardInterop%2A> method to forward all keyboard messages when a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] window is opened modelessly.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.EnableModelessKeyboardInterop%2A> método para encaminhar todas as mensagens do teclado quando uma [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] janela é aberta em modo sem restrição.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.EnableModelessKeyboardInterop%2A> method installs a message filter in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.EnableModelessKeyboardInterop%2A> método instalará um filtro de mensagem no [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-aplicativo com base em.

trans-unit.source: The filter forwards all keyboard messages when the modeless window is active.
trans-unit.target: O filtro encaminha todas as mensagens do teclado quando a janela sem janela restrita está ativa.

trans-unit.source: for full trust for all callers higher in the call stack.
trans-unit.target: para confiança total para todos os chamadores superior na pilha de chamadas.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não pode ser usado pelo código parcialmente confiável.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is entered.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controle é inserido.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Enter> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Enter>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control has input focus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o controle tem foco de entrada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control has focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o controle tiver o foco; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font" /> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.FontChanged> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.FontChanged>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor" /> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.ForeColorChanged> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColorChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.ForeColorChanged>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColorChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The custom-sized area for a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: A área com tamanho personalizado de um elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base class implementation <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize(System.Drawing.Size)" /> to provide correct layout behavior for the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] elements.
trans-unit.target: Substitui a implementação da classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize(System.Drawing.Size)" /> para fornecer o comportamento de layout correto para os elementos [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] hospedados.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> computed by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" /> control, given the constraints specified by <paramref name="proposedSize" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> computado com o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" />, dadas as restrições especificadas pelo <paramref name="proposedSize" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre durante uma operação de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.GiveFeedback> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.GiveFeedback>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control receives focus.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controle recebe o foco.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.GotFocus> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.GotFocus>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent container of the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o contêiner pai do elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] hospedado.

trans-unit.source: The parent container.
trans-unit.target: O contêiner pai.

trans-unit.source: The host container is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, which is the parent container for the hosted element.
trans-unit.target: O contêiner host é o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, que é o contêiner pai para o elemento hospedado.

trans-unit.source: The host container is always at the root of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: O contêiner host sempre é a raiz do [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] hierarquia de elementos.

trans-unit.source: To access the parent of the hosted element, access <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.HostContainer%2A> directly.
trans-unit.target: Para acessar o pai do elemento hospedado, acessar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.HostContainer%2A> diretamente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the IME mode of a control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modo IME de um controle.

trans-unit.source: The IME mode of the control.
trans-unit.target: O modo do IME do controle.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control's display requires redrawing.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a exibição de um controle precisa ser redesenhada.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Invalidated> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidated?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Invalidated>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidated?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The character to forward.
trans-unit.target: O caractere a ser encaminhado.

trans-unit.source: Ensures that all WM_CHAR key messages are forwarded to the hosted element.
trans-unit.target: Garante que todas as mensagens importantes de WM_CHAR são encaminhadas para o elemento hospedado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: If the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element does not process `charCode`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> control processes it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se o hospedado [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] não processar o elemento `charCode`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> controle processa-o com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed while the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma tecla é pressionada enquanto o controle está em foco.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.KeyDown> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.KeyDown>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed while the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma tecla é pressionada enquanto o controle está em foco.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.KeyPress> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.KeyPress>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is released while the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma tecla é liberada e o controle tem o foco.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.KeyUp> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.KeyUp>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control should reposition its child controls.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um controle deve reposicionar seus controles filho.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Layout> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Layout>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the input focus leaves the control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o foco de entrada deixa o controle.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Leave> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Leave>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control loses focus.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controle perde o foco.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.LostFocus> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.LostFocus>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control loses or gains mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controle perde ou ganha captura do mouse.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseCaptureChanged> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseCaptureChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseCaptureChanged>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseCaptureChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is clicked by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o usuário clica no controle com o mouse.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseClick> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseClick>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is double clicked by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o usuário clica duas vezes no controle com o mouse.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseDoubleClick> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseDoubleClick>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer is over the control and a mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o ponteiro do mouse fica sobre o controle e um botão do mouse é pressionado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseDown> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseDown>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer enters the control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o ponteiro do mouse entra no controle.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseEnter> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseEnter>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer rests on the control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o ponteiro do mouse fica no controle.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseHover> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseHover>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer leaves the control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o ponteiro do mouse deixa o controle.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseLeave> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseLeave>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer is moved over the control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o ponteiro do mouse é movido sobre o controle.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseMove> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseMove>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer is over the control and a mouse button is released.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o ponteiro do mouse está sobre o controle e um botão do mouse é liberado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseUp> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseUp>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse wheel moves while the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a roda do mouse se move enquanto o controle tem foco.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseWheel> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseWheel>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EnabledChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EnabledChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnEnabledChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnEnabledChanged%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnEnabledChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnEnabledChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnEnabledChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnEnabledChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.GotFocus" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.GotFocus" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnGotFocus%2A> method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnGotFocus%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o método <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnGotFocus%2A>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnGotFocus%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnHandleCreated%2A> method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o método <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnHandleCreated%2A>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnLeave%2A> method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnLeave%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o método <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnLeave%2A>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnLeave%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnPaint%2A> method forwards to the base class implementation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> implementação o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnPaint%2A> método encaminha para a implementação da classe base.

trans-unit.source: Do not override this implementation of the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Não substitua esta implementação do <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" /> control manages the painting of its hosted element, and overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> will cause unpredictable results.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" /> gerencia o controle de pintura do seu elemento hospedado e substituindo <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> causará resultados imprevisíveis.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> that contains information about the control to paint.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> que contém informações sobre o controle de pintura.

trans-unit.source: Paints the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: Colore a tela de fundo do controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnPaintBackground%2A> method paints the parent control's background into an offscreen HBITMAP.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnPaintBackground%2A> método pinta o plano de fundo do controle pai em um HBITMAP fora da tela.

trans-unit.source: This bitmap is used as the background in the hosted element to support transparency.
trans-unit.target: Esse bitmap é usado como plano de fundo do elemento hospedado para dar suporte a transparência.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este método oferece suporte à [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] infraestrutura e não se destina a ser usada diretamente no seu código.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Renders the control using the provided <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Renderiza o controle usando o objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> fornecido.

trans-unit.source: The name of the property that has changed and requires translation.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade que foi alterado e requer conversão.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the property.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PropertyMap" /> that a property has changed.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PropertyMap" /> que uma propriedade foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: for full trust for inheritors.
trans-unit.target: para confiança total de herdeiros.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não pode ser herdado por código parcialmente confiável.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnVisibleChanged%2A> method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnVisibleChanged%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o método <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnVisibleChanged%2A>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnVisibleChanged%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control's padding changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o preenchimento do controle muda.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PaddingChanged> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PaddingChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PaddingChanged>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PaddingChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" /> control is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" /> é redesenhado.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of this event adds event handlers to the base <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> event.
trans-unit.target: A implementação desse evento adiciona manipuladores de eventos para a base de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown" /> event when a key is pressed while focus is on this control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes do evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown" /> quando uma chave é pressionada enquanto o foco está neste controle.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PreviewKeyDown> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PreviewKeyDown>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />, passado por referência, que representa a mensagem de janela a ser processada.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values representing the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> que representam a chave a ser processada.

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the command before normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] processing.
trans-unit.target: Processa uma chave de comando, garantindo que o elemento hospedado tenha oportunidade para manipular o comando antes do processamento de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] normal.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o caractere for uma tecla de atalho [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If a key message is not handled by the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, it is forwarded up the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] class hierarchy for processing.
trans-unit.target: Se uma mensagem de chave não é manipulada pelo hospedado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento, ele é encaminhado para cima o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] classe hierarquia para processamento.

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: para confiança total do chamador imediato.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não pode ser usado pelo código parcialmente confiável.

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: O caractere a ser processado.

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the mnemonic before normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] processing.
trans-unit.target: Processa um caractere mnemônico, garantindo que o elemento hospedado tenha uma oportunidade de manipular o mnemônico antes do processamento de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] normal.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o caractere for uma tecla de atalho [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If a key message is not handled by the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, it is forwarded up the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] class hierarchy for processing.
trans-unit.target: Se uma mensagem de chave não é manipulada pelo hospedado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento, ele é encaminhado para cima o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] classe hierarquia para processamento.

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: para confiança total do chamador imediato.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não pode ser usado pelo código parcialmente confiável.

trans-unit.source: Gets the property map, which determines how setting properties on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" /> control affects the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o mapa de propriedade, que determina como configurar as propriedades no controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" /> afeta o elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] hospedado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap" /> that maps <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" /> to properties on the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap" /> que mapeia <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" /> a propriedades em hospedado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies have two similar but different property models.
trans-unit.target: As tecnologias [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] têm dois modelos de propriedade semelhantes, mas diferentes.

trans-unit.source: *Property mapping* supports interoperation between the two architectures.
trans-unit.target: *Mapeamento de propriedade* dá suporte à interoperação entre as duas arquiteturas.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações, consulte [Windows Forms e mapeamento de propriedade do WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PropertyMap%2A> property to translate the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Margin%2A> property for a hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PropertyMap%2A> propriedade traduzir o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Margin%2A> propriedade hospedado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Walkthrough: Mapping Properties Using the ElementHost Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-mapping-properties-using-the-elementhost-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações, consulte [Instruções passo a passo: mapeando propriedades usando o controle ElementHost](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-mapping-properties-using-the-elementhost-control.md).

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre durante uma operação do tipo arrastar e soltar e permite que a fonte de arrastar determine se a operação do tipo arrastar e soltar deve ser cancelada.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.QueryContinueDrag> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.QueryContinueDrag>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controle é redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Resize> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Resize>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft" /> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.RightToLeftChanged> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.RightToLeftChanged>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The scaling factor for the x-axis.
trans-unit.target: O fator de escala para o eixo x.

trans-unit.source: The scaling factor for the y-axis.
trans-unit.target: O fator de escala para o eixo y.

trans-unit.source: Scales the parent container and the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: Escala o contêiner pai e o controle [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] hospedado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para especificar a direção do controle a ser selecionado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to move forward in the tab order; <see langword="false" /> to move backward in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para avançar na ordem de tabulação; <see langword="false" /> para voltar na ordem de tabulação.

trans-unit.source: Activates the hosted element.
trans-unit.target: Ativa o elemento hospedado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Select%2A> method activates the hosted element.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Select%2A> método ativa o elemento hospedado.

trans-unit.source: If more than one hosted element exists, either the first or last element is activated, depending on the `directed` and `forward` parameters.
trans-unit.target: Se houver mais de um elemento hospedado, o elemento primeiro ou último é ativado, dependendo do `directed` e `forward` parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: Repeated calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Select%2A> method do not traverse the hosted elements.
trans-unit.target: Repetidas chamadas para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Select%2A> método não atravessa os elementos hospedados.

trans-unit.source: To select subsequent elements, call the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.HostContainer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para selecionar elementos subsequentes, chame o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A> método o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.HostContainer%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This implementation forwards tab keys from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação encaminha as chaves de guia de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] para [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size" /> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.SizeChanged> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.SizeChanged>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text" /> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.TextChanged> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.TextChanged>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: A message to process.
trans-unit.target: Uma mensagem a ser processada.

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Processa mensagens do Windows.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.WndProc%2A> method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o método <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.WndProc%2A>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: para confiança total do chamador imediato.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não pode ser usado pelo código parcialmente confiável.

trans-unit.source: for full trust for inheritors.
trans-unit.target: para confiança total de herdeiros.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não pode ser herdado por código parcialmente confiável.
